channel.title: Help with antilag.java
channel.description:
how do you use antilag.java to make the server reset every 10 mins?
an some1 tell me :confused:

item.title: Help with antilag.java
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

public void resetserver() { misc.println("RESETING SERVER!!!"); misc.println("Saving all games..."); PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true; misc.println("GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS"); ResetTimer = 0; closeListener(); runserver(); } public void process() { ResetTimer += 1; if(ResetTimer >= 100) <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< { resetserver(); } }

Change the ResetTimer to 600 I think. Also, if youâ€™re ResetTimer = 0; Is any number other than 0, change it to 0.
